text: Sinead is giving a seminar at the Institute of Biodiversity, Animal Health and Comparative Medicine, University of Glasgow.
Sinead is speaking at the Society for Experimental Biology (invited speaker at the Reproductive Senescence symposium) in Montpelier, France.
Hester and Molly will be attending the International Congress of Entomology in Helsinki, Finland (Hester giving invited talk at a symposium).
Hester is speaking at the European Society for Evolutionary Biology meeting in Prague, Czech Republic.
